sp_widget.description: Connect Four is a two-player competitive game widget designed for the ServiceNow Service Portal as part of the sn-games suite. This widget replicates the classic vertical strategy game where players take turns dropping colored discs into a 7-column, 6-row grid. The first player to align four discs horizontally, vertically, or diagonally wins.
sp_widget.name: Connect Four Game Widget
